name: places/ChIJBWshoXBZwokRCwphBE-hpOk
formattedAddress: 743 E 9th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 743 E 9th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: Very rude! I am 8months pregnant and denied medication because my 2 year old was throwing a tantrum and SAM CHARLTON and I quote told me to “control my kid , they’re trying to run a business” Mean while I was trying to “control my kid” and sit on the phone with Medicaid and give them my information for my medicine. The woman followed his lead and was very nasty as well. I did not curse , scream but simply tell them they are not doing anything but adding to my over stimulation and instead of understanding that the woman stated “I am stressing her out” , VERY UNPROFESSIONAL .. But they’re “trying to run a business”

originalText.text: Subpar pharmacy....this place gets business because the area doesn't have many options. The shoplifters ran the rite aid out the area. This place is always out medications and never seem like they care about the people they service...they wont even relay you to another pharmacy to finish filling your prescription due to the fact that the seem to never have what you need...incase that happens to be benadryl or cough drops than this place has you covered

originalText.text: Great staff, friendly atmosphere and always polite and pleasant. I had a mixup and instead of them just pushing me off and saying I lost the pills they did a recount of the medication, something I’ve never heard of any pharmacy doing especially for controlled substances and they didn’t have to do anything but they made sure that everything was correct with my prescriptions no matter what. A++++

originalText.text:
One of the quickest pharmacy I have known. Prescriptions are sent in and within 5 to 10 minutes  its ready for me to pickup. Very friendly staff.
I would definitely recommend it others.
And one more plus thing is you can pay the bills, parking tickets and now also an UPS access point. Great!!
